title: Government (Mayor of Limerick) and Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2024 (No.
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Local Government (Mayor of Limerick)
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Local Government (Mayor of Limerick) 
and Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2024 (Commencement) (No. 2) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited local government (mayor limerick) miscellaneous provision act 2024 (commencement) (no 2) order 2024

title: Government (Mayor of Limerick) and Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2024 (No.
heading: 2. The 16th day of May 2024 is appointed as the day on which the following
text_raw:
2. The 16th day of May 2024 is appointed as the day on which the following 
provisions of the Local Government (Mayor of Limerick) and Miscellaneous 
Provisions Act 2024 (No. 7 of 2024) shall come into operation: 

(a) 

section 4; 

(b) Part 2 in so far as it is not already in operation; 

(c) Part 3; 

(d) Part 4, other than sections 33 and 34; 

(e) Part 6; 

(f) Part 7; 

(g) Schedule 1. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

14 May, 2024. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 17th May, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [207] 3
